review: Could not get the sound to work on Amazon or Netflix, even though I am a subscriber to both.  After multiple attempts to trouble shoot with Amazon, I returned one and got another with the same problem.  Amazon said it was not compatible with my TV.  Chromecast and Roku work with it so that is what I'm using on my TVs.
author: cuartor wynne

review: it did what it said it was going to do it was great
author: George Thompson

review: Super easy setup......just plug in to your HDMI port and your set! It Navigates through Youtube, Hulu, netflix etc pretty much the same as using Wii or any other gaming system.
author: mommyofone

review: We got this to try because we had Chromecast but had trouble getting it to work.  It was always freezing up in the middle of a show.  The Fire stick is a lot better!  The remote is easy to use and it doesn't freeze up in the middle of a show.  Great product at a great price!  Love!!!
author: Nicole Elizabeth Chandler

review: Dont buy it. If you have a choice let Amazon Fire Stick be your last choice. I beg you!!!!!!!
author: Savage

review: It's great, the only addition I would do is for it to accept the apps to navigate internet.
author: Marina Linck
